section.title: Getting Help
section.para:
Subscribe to the &sr; users list. Use it to get answers to installation and use questions. To subscribe send email to: majordomo@sci.utah.edu with the following in the body of the message (no subject):
subscribe scirun-users
To ask a question send email to: scirun-users@sci.utah.edu

Include a verbatim (cut and paste) copy of errors displayed. Also include a short paragraph describing the context of the error (creating a module, running a network, etc.) and the version of &sr; used.
See also the Installation and User FAQs.
